00023 BOOLEAN gfCursorDatabaseInit = FALSE;
00024 
00025 CursorFileData *gpCursorFileDatabase;
00026 CursorData         *gpCursorDatabase;
00027 INT16                          gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00028 INT16                          gsCurMouseOffsetX = 0;
00029 INT16                          gsCurMouseOffsetY = 0;
00030 UINT16                         gsCurMouseHeight = 0;
00031 UINT16                         gsCurMouseWidth = 0;
00032 UINT16                         gusNumDataFiles = 0;

00045 BOOLEAN BltToMouseCursorFromVObject( HVOBJECT hVObject, UINT16 usVideoObjectSubIndex, UINT16 usXPos, UINT16 usYPos )
00046 {
00047   BOOLEAN      ReturnValue;
00048 
00049   ReturnValue = BltVideoObject(MOUSE_BUFFER, hVObject, usVideoObjectSubIndex, usXPos, usYPos, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
00050 
00051   return ReturnValue;
00052 }
00053 
00054 BOOLEAN BltToMouseCursorFromVObjectWithOutline( HVOBJECT hVObject, UINT16 usVideoObjectSubIndex, UINT16 usXPos, UINT16 usYPos )
00055 {
00056   BOOLEAN      ReturnValue;
00057   ETRLEObject      *pTrav;
00058       INT16 sXPos, sYPos;
00059 
00060       // Adjust for offsets
00061       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ usVideoObjectSubIndex ] );
00062 
00063       sXPos = 0;
00064       sYPos = 0;
00065 
00066       // Remove offsets...
00067       sXPos -= pTrav->sOffsetX;
00068       sYPos -= pTrav->sOffsetY;
00069 
00070       // Center!
00071       sXPos += ( ( gsCurMouseWidth - pTrav->usWidth ) / 2 );
00072       sYPos += ( ( gsCurMouseHeight - pTrav->usHeight ) / 2 );
00073 
00074   ReturnValue = BltVideoObjectOutline(MOUSE_BUFFER, hVObject, usVideoObjectSubIndex, sXPos, sYPos, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ), TRUE );
00075 
00076   return ReturnValue;
00077 }

00080 // THESE TWO PARAMETERS MUST POINT TO STATIC OR GLOBAL DATA, NOT AUTOMATIC VARIABLES
00081 void InitCursorDatabase( CursorFileData *pCursorFileData, CursorData *pCursorData, UINT16 suNumDataFiles )
00082 {
00083       // Set global values!
00084 
00085       gpCursorFileDatabase  = pCursorFileData;
00086       gpCursorDatabase              =     pCursorData;
00087       gusNumDataFiles                     = suNumDataFiles;
00088       gfCursorDatabaseInit = TRUE;
00089 }

00091 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00092 //
00093 // Cursor Handlers

00096 
00097 BOOLEAN LoadCursorData(UINT32 uiCursorIndex)
00098 {
00099       // Load cursor data will load all data required for the cursor specified by this index
00100       CursorData        *pCurData;
00101       CursorImage       *pCurImage;
00102       UINT32                        cnt;
00103       INT16                         sMaxHeight = -1;
00104       INT16                         sMaxWidth = -1;
00105   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00106 
00107       pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00108 
00109       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00110       {
00111 
00112             pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00113 
00114             if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].fLoaded == FALSE )
00115             {
00116                   //
00117                   // The file containing the video object hasn't been loaded yet. Let's load it now
00118                   //
00119                   VOBJECT_DESC VideoObjectDescription;
00120                   // FIRST LOAD AS AN HIMAGE SO WE CAN GET AUX DATA!
00121                   HIMAGE                         hImage;
00122                   AuxObjectData *pAuxData;
00123 
00124 
00125                   // ATE: First check if we are using an extern vo cursor...
00126                   if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFlags & USE_EXTERN_VO_CURSOR )
00127                   {
00128                         // Let's check if we have NOT NULL here...
00129                         if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject == NULL )
00130                         {
00131                               // Something wrong here...
00132 
00133                         }
00134 
00135                   }
00136                   else
00137                   {
00138                         hImage = CreateImage( (CHAR8 *)gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFilename, IMAGE_ALLDATA );
00139                         if (hImage == NULL)
00140                         {
00141                               return( FALSE );
00142                         }
00143 
00144                         VideoObjectDescription.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMHIMAGE;
00145                         VideoObjectDescription.hImage                   = hImage;
00146 
00147                         if ( !AddVideoObject( &VideoObjectDescription, &( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].uiIndex) ) )
00148                         {
00149                               return( FALSE );
00150                         }
00151 
00152                         // Check for animated tile
00153                         if (hImage->uiAppDataSize > 0 )
00154                         {
00155                               // Valid auxiliary data, so get # od frames from data
00156                               pAuxData = ( AuxObjectData* ) hImage->pAppData;
00157 
00158                               if ( pAuxData->fFlags & AUX_ANIMATED_TILE )
00159                               {
00160                                     gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFlags |= ANIMATED_CURSOR;
00161                                     gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubNumberOfFrames = pAuxData->ubNumberOfFrames;
00162                               }
00163                         }
00164 
00165                         // the hImage is no longer needed
00166                         DestroyImage( hImage );
00167                         
00168                         // Save hVObject....
00169                         GetVideoObject( &(gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject), gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].uiIndex );
00170 
00171                   }
00172 
00173                   gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].fLoaded = TRUE;
00174 
00175             }
00176 
00177             // Get ETRLE Data for this video object
00178             pTrav = &(gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject->pETRLEObject[ pCurImage->uiSubIndex ] );
00179 
00180             if( !pTrav )
00181             {
00182                   return FALSE;
00183             }
00184 
00185             if ( pTrav->usHeight > sMaxHeight  )
00186             {
00187                   sMaxHeight = pTrav->usHeight;
00188             }
00189 
00190             if ( pTrav->usWidth  > sMaxWidth )
00191             {
00192                   sMaxWidth = pTrav->usWidth;
00193             }
00194 
00195       }
00196 
00197 
00198       pCurData->usHeight = sMaxHeight;
00199       pCurData->usWidth = sMaxWidth;
00200 
00201 
00202       if ( pCurData->sOffsetX == CENTER_CURSOR )
00203       {
00204             pCurData->sOffsetX = ( pCurData->usWidth / 2 );
00205       }
00206       if ( pCurData->sOffsetX == RIGHT_CURSOR )
00207       {
00208             pCurData->sOffsetX = pCurData->usWidth;
00209       }
00210       if ( pCurData->sOffsetX == LEFT_CURSOR )
00211       {
00212             pCurData->sOffsetX = 0;
00213       }
00214 
00215       if ( pCurData->sOffsetY == CENTER_CURSOR )
00216       {
00217             pCurData->sOffsetY = ( pCurData->usHeight / 2 );
00218       }
00219       if ( pCurData->sOffsetY == BOTTOM_CURSOR )
00220       {
00221             pCurData->sOffsetY = pCurData->usHeight;
00222       }
00223       if ( pCurData->sOffsetY == TOP_CURSOR )
00224       {
00225             pCurData->sOffsetY = 0;
00226       }
00227 
00228 
00229       gsCurMouseOffsetX = pCurData->sOffsetX;
00230       gsCurMouseOffsetY = pCurData->sOffsetY;
00231       gsCurMouseHeight  = pCurData->usHeight;
00232       gsCurMouseWidth         = pCurData->usWidth;
00233 
00234       // Adjust relative offsets
00235       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00236       {
00237             pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00238 
00239             // Get ETRLE Data for this video object
00240             pTrav = &(gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject->pETRLEObject[ pCurImage->uiSubIndex ] );
00241 
00242             if( !pTrav )
00243             {
00244                   return FALSE;
00245             }
00246 
00247             if ( pCurImage->usPosX == CENTER_SUBCURSOR )
00248             {
00249                   pCurImage->usPosX = pCurData->sOffsetX - ( pTrav->usWidth / 2 );
00250             }
00251 
00252             if ( pCurImage->usPosY == CENTER_SUBCURSOR )
00253             {
00254                   pCurImage->usPosY = pCurData->sOffsetY - ( pTrav->usHeight / 2 );
00255             }
00256 
00257       }
00258 
00259 
00260       return TRUE;
00261 }

00263 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00264 
00265 void UnLoadCursorData(UINT32 uiCursorIndex)
00266 {
00267       // This function will unload add data used for this cursor
00268       //
00269       // Ok, first we make sure that the video object file is indeed loaded. Once this is verified, we will
00270       // move on to the deletion
00271       //
00272       CursorData        *pCurData;
00273       CursorImage       *pCurImage;
00274       UINT32                        cnt;
00275 
00276       pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00277 
00278       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00279       {
00280 
00281             pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00282 
00283             if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].fLoaded )
00284             {
00285                   if ( !( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFlags & USE_EXTERN_VO_CURSOR ) )
00286                   {
00287                         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].uiIndex);                  
00288                         gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].uiIndex = 0;
00289                   }
00290                   gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].fLoaded = FALSE;
00291             }
00292 
00293       }
00294 }
00295 
00296 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00297 
00298 void   CursorDatabaseClear(void)
00299 {
00300   UINT32   uiIndex;
00301 
00302   for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < gusNumDataFiles; uiIndex++)
00303   {
00304     if (gpCursorFileDatabase[uiIndex].fLoaded == TRUE)
00305         {
00306                   if ( !( gpCursorFileDatabase[ uiIndex ].ubFlags & USE_EXTERN_VO_CURSOR ) )
00307                   {
00308             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpCursorFileDatabase[uiIndex].uiIndex);
00309                         gpCursorFileDatabase[uiIndex].uiIndex = 0;
00310                   }
00311 
00312       gpCursorFileDatabase[uiIndex].fLoaded = FALSE;
00313     }
00314   }
00315 }

00319 BOOLEAN SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( UINT32 uiCursorIndex  )
00320 {
00321 #ifdef JA2
00322 
00323   BOOLEAN                     ReturnValue = TRUE;
00324       UINT16                        usSubIndex;
00325       CursorData        *pCurData;
00326       CursorImage       *pCurImage;
00327       UINT32                        cnt;
00328       INT16                         sCenterValX, sCenterValY;
00329       HVOBJECT                hVObject;
00330   ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00331       UINT16                        usEffHeight, usEffWidth;
00332 
00333       if ( gfCursorDatabaseInit )
00334       {
00335             // Enter mouse buffer mutex
00336         //EnterMutex(MOUSE_BUFFER_MUTEX, __LINE__, __FILE__);
00337 
00338             // If the current cursor is the first index, disable cursors
00339 
00340             if ( uiCursorIndex == VIDEO_NO_CURSOR )
00341             {
00342                   EraseMouseCursor( );
00343 
00344                   SetMouseCursorProperties( 0, 0, 5, 5 );
00345                   DirtyCursor( );
00346 
00347                   //EnableCursor( FALSE );
00348 
00349             }
00350             else
00351             {
00352                   // CHECK FOR EXTERN CURSOR
00353                   if ( uiCursorIndex == EXTERN_CURSOR || uiCursorIndex == EXTERN2_CURSOR  )
00354                   {
00355                         INT16 sSubX, sSubY;
00356                         HVOBJECT                hVObjectTemp;
00357                         ETRLEObject *pTravTemp;
00358 
00359                         // Erase old cursor
00360                         EraseMouseCursor( );
00361 
00362                         if ( uiCursorIndex == EXTERN2_CURSOR )
00363                         {
00364                               // Get ETRLE values
00365                               GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiExtern2Vo );
00366                               pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ gusExtern2VoSubIndex ] );
00367                         }
00368                         else
00369                         {
00370                               // Get ETRLE values
00371                               GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiExternVo );
00372                               pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ gusExternVoSubIndex ] );
00373                         }
00374 
00375                         // Determine center
00376                         sCenterValX = 0;
00377                         sCenterValY = 0;
00378 
00379                         // Effective height
00380                         usEffHeight = pTrav->usHeight + pTrav->sOffsetY;
00381                         usEffWidth  = pTrav->usWidth + pTrav->sOffsetX;
00382 
00383 
00384                         // ATE: Check for extern 2nd...
00385                         if ( uiCursorIndex == EXTERN2_CURSOR )
00386                         {
00387                               BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( MOUSE_BUFFER, guiExtern2Vo, gusExtern2VoSubIndex, 0, 0, 0, FALSE );
00388 
00389                               // Get ETRLE values
00390                               GetVideoObject( &hVObjectTemp, guiExternVo );
00391                               pTravTemp = &(hVObjectTemp->pETRLEObject[ gusExternVoSubIndex ] );
00392 
00393                               sSubX = ( pTrav->usWidth - pTravTemp->usWidth - pTravTemp->sOffsetX ) / 2;
00394                               sSubY = ( pTrav->usHeight - pTravTemp->usHeight - pTravTemp->sOffsetY ) / 2;
00395 
00396                               BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( MOUSE_BUFFER, guiExternVo, gusExternVoSubIndex, sSubX, sSubY, 0, FALSE );
00397 
00398                         }
00399                         else
00400                         {
00401                               BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( MOUSE_BUFFER, guiExternVo, gusExternVoSubIndex, 0, 0, 0, FALSE );
00402                         }
00403       
00404                         // Hook into hook function
00405                         if ( gMouseBltOverride != NULL )
00406                         {
00407                               gMouseBltOverride( );
00408                         }
00409 
00410 
00411       #ifdef JA2
00412                         SetMouseCursorProperties( (INT16)(usEffWidth/2), (INT16)(usEffHeight/2), (UINT16)(usEffHeight), (UINT16)(usEffWidth ) );
00413       #else
00414                         SetMouseCursorProperties( sCenterValY, (INT16)( sCenterValY + gsGlobalCursorYOffset ), MAX_CURSOR_HEIGHT, MAX_CURSOR_WIDTH );
00415       #endif
00416                         DirtyCursor( );
00417 
00418                   }
00419                   else
00420                   {
00421                         pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00422 
00423                         // First check if we are a differnet curosr...
00424                         if ( uiCursorIndex != guiOldSetCursor )
00425                         {
00426                               // OK, check if we are a delay cursor...
00427                               if ( pCurData->bFlags & DELAY_START_CURSOR )
00428                               {
00429                                     guiDelayTimer = GetTickCount( );
00430                               }
00431                         }
00432 
00433                         guiOldSetCursor = uiCursorIndex;
00434 
00435                         // Olny update if delay timer has elapsed...
00436                         if ( pCurData->bFlags & DELAY_START_CURSOR )
00437                         {
00438                               if ( ( GetTickCount( ) - guiDelayTimer ) < 1000 )
00439                               {
00440                                     EraseMouseCursor( );
00441 
00442                                     SetMouseCursorProperties( 0, 0, 5, 5 );
00443                                     DirtyCursor( );
00444 
00445                                     return( TRUE );
00446                               }
00447                         }
00448 
00449 
00450                         //
00451                         // Call LoadCursorData to make sure that the video object is loaded
00452                         //
00453                         LoadCursorData(uiCursorIndex);
00454 
00455                         // Erase old cursor
00456                         EraseMouseCursor( );
00457                         // NOW ACCOMODATE COMPOSITE CURSORS
00458                         pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00459 
00460                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00461                         {
00462 
00463                               // Check if we are a flashing cursor!
00464                               if ( pCurData->bFlags & CURSOR_TO_FLASH )
00465                               {
00466                                     if ( cnt <= 1 )
00467                                     {
00468                                           if ( pCurData->bFlashIndex != cnt )
00469                                           {
00470                                                 continue;
00471                                           }
00472                                     }
00473                               }
00474                               // Check if we are a sub cursor!
00475                               // IN this case, do all frames but
00476                               // skip the 1st or second!
00477 
00478                               if ( pCurData->bFlags & CURSOR_TO_SUB_CONDITIONALLY )
00479                               {
00480                                     if ( pCurData->bFlags & CURSOR_TO_FLASH )
00481                                     {
00482                                           if ( cnt <= 1 )
00483                                           {
00484                                                 if ( pCurData->bFlashIndex != cnt )
00485                                                 {
00486                                                       continue;
00487                                                 }
00488                                           }
00489                                     }
00490                                     else if ( pCurData->bFlags & CURSOR_TO_FLASH2 )
00491                                     {
00492                                           if ( cnt <= 2 && cnt > 0 )
00493                                           {
00494                                                 if ( pCurData->bFlashIndex != cnt )
00495                                                 {
00496                                                       continue;
00497                                                 }
00498                                           }
00499                                     }     
00500                                     else
00501                                     {
00502                                           if ( cnt <= 1 )
00503                                           {
00504                                                 if ( pCurData->bFlashIndex != cnt )
00505                                                 {
00506                                                       continue;
00507                                                 }
00508                                           }
00509                                     }
00510                               }
00511 
00512                               pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00513 
00514                               // Adjust sub-index if cursor is animated
00515                               if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex].ubFlags & ANIMATED_CURSOR )
00516                               {
00517                                     usSubIndex = (UINT16)pCurImage->uiCurrentFrame;
00518                               }
00519                               else
00520                               {
00521                                     usSubIndex = pCurImage->uiSubIndex;
00522                               }
00523 
00524                               if ( pCurImage->usPosX != HIDE_SUBCURSOR && pCurImage->usPosY != HIDE_SUBCURSOR )
00525                               {
00526                                     // Blit cursor at position in mouse buffer
00527                                     if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex].ubFlags & USE_OUTLINE_BLITTER )
00528                                     {
00529                                           ReturnValue = BltToMouseCursorFromVObjectWithOutline( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject , usSubIndex, pCurImage->usPosX, pCurImage->usPosY );
00530                                     }
00531                                     else
00532                                     {
00533                                           ReturnValue = BltToMouseCursorFromVObject( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject , usSubIndex, pCurImage->usPosX, pCurImage->usPosY );
00534                                     }
00535                                     if ( !ReturnValue )
00536                                     {
00537                                           return( FALSE );
00538                                     }
00539 
00540                               }
00541 
00542                               //if ( pCurData->bFlags & CURSOR_TO_FLASH )
00543                               //{
00544                               //    break;
00545                               //}
00546                         }
00547 
00548                         // Hook into hook function
00549                         if ( gMouseBltOverride != NULL )
00550                         {
00551                               gMouseBltOverride( );
00552                         }
00553 
00554 
00555                         sCenterValX = pCurData->sOffsetX;
00556                         sCenterValY = pCurData->sOffsetY;
00557 
00558       #ifdef JA2
00559                         SetMouseCursorProperties( sCenterValX, (INT16)( sCenterValY + gsGlobalCursorYOffset ),    pCurData->usHeight,     pCurData->usWidth );
00560       #else
00561                         SetMouseCursorProperties( sCenterValY, (INT16)( sCenterValY + gsGlobalCursorYOffset ), MAX_CURSOR_HEIGHT, MAX_CURSOR_WIDTH );
00562       #endif
00563                         DirtyCursor( );
00564                   }
00565             }
00566       }
00567       else
00568       {
00569             if ( uiCursorIndex == VIDEO_NO_CURSOR )
00570             {
00571                   EraseMouseCursor( );
00572 
00573                   SetMouseCursorProperties( 0, 0, 5, 5 );
00574                   DirtyCursor( );
00575 
00576                   //EnableCursor( FALSE );
00577 
00578             }
00579             else
00580             {
00581 
00582                   SetCurrentCursor( (UINT16)uiCursorIndex, 0, 0 );
00583                   ReturnValue = TRUE;
00584             }
00585       }
00586 
00587   return ( ReturnValue );
00588 #else
00589       return(0);
00590 #endif
00591 
00592 }
00593 
00594 void SetMouseBltHook( MOUSEBLT_HOOK pMouseBltOverride )
00595 {
00596       gMouseBltOverride = pMouseBltOverride;
00597 }

00600 // Sets an external video object as cursor file data....
00601 void SetExternVOData( UINT32 uiCursorIndex, HVOBJECT hVObject, UINT16 usSubIndex )
00602 {
00603       CursorData        *pCurData;
00604       CursorImage       *pCurImage;
00605       UINT32                        cnt;
00606 
00607       pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00608 
00609       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00610       {
00611             pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00612 
00613             if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFlags & USE_EXTERN_VO_CURSOR )
00614             {
00615                   // OK, set Video Object here....
00616 
00617                   // If loaded, unload...
00618                   UnLoadCursorData( uiCursorIndex );
00619                   
00620                   // Set extern vo
00621                   gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject = hVObject;
00622                   pCurImage->uiSubIndex = usSubIndex;
00623 
00624 
00625                   // Reload....
00626                   LoadCursorData( uiCursorIndex );
00627             }
00628       }
00629 }
00630 
00631 
00632 void RemoveExternVOData( UINT32 uiCursorIndex )
00633 {
00634       CursorData        *pCurData;
00635       CursorImage       *pCurImage;
00636       UINT32                        cnt;
00637 
00638       pCurData = &( gpCursorDatabase[ uiCursorIndex ] );
00639 
00640       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < pCurData->usNumComposites; cnt++ )
00641       {
00642             pCurImage = &( pCurData->Composites[ cnt ] );
00643 
00644             if ( gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].ubFlags & USE_EXTERN_VO_CURSOR )
00645             {
00646                   gpCursorFileDatabase[ pCurImage->uiFileIndex ].hVObject = NULL;
00647             }
00648 
00649       }     
00650 }
